reviews.text:
We enjoyed our stay at the Nobis during our visit to Stockholm.

We arrived early and luckily we did not wait long for our room, as the staff were welcoming and accommodating.
The hotel lobby, bar, lounge, and amenity spaces are quite beautiful, and breakfast was good.
The rooms are clean and well appointed, though on the cozy side. I didn't snap a picture of our room, but the pictures on the website show them off well.
Finally, the location is fantastic, in the center of Stockholm and close to many great sites, restaurants, shopping, and the central train station. If we have the pleasure of visiting Stockholm again, we will certainly stay at the Nobis Hotel.

My room was on the smaller side and if you leave the window open, it can be noisy at night.  But cabinets and bathroom are well organized and the lounge, reception, cafe, gym are all excellent.  Location is superb - near shopping. Water and boat tours .   Very nice contemporary decoration

A very friendly and helpful staff is at the front desk. Breakfast is very good.
The food quality is high, and the selection is wide. The rooms are clean and well-appointed. Our room was a bit small and looked into an interior courtyard, so there was not much natural daylight. The hotel's location is excellent.
If you get a chance, ride the vintage tram to get a feel for this city.

We had a fantastic stay at Nobis Hotel. The staff was friendly and attentive, the room was clean and comfortable, and the amenities were excellent. The restaurant was truly outstanding with delicious food. Perfect location near major attractions. Highly recommended for a relaxing and enjoyable experience!

Definitely not a five star hotel. Maybe a 3 star at best. Our room had a very strange layout with minimal lighting. Only one elevator to our side of the building which faced the park and Berg Building. The elevator wait time was unsatisfactory. At night the club in the Berg building played extremely loud DJ music starting at 11pm and lasting until 4am. We could not sleep for two consecutive nights. No wonder the hotel had earplugs as an amenity. Good buffet breakfast though and a nice central location, except for the nightclub across the street. But for the very high price we paid, For  I do not recommend this hotel. Very disappointed.
